text:
@realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC Gov. Cooper wanted masks and social distancing. Your stupid ass made it impossible to go to NC because you're indifferent human suffering. 
You were raised badly.
#FailureInChief
#PutinsPuppet 
#COVID19 
#WearAMask
